summary:
• Experienced project lead, engineer, and manager
• 7 years of senior project leadership – delivering large capital projects at manufacturing sites
• 10 years of project management experience – Prince2 trained, MS Project experience
• 15 years of controls engineering experience in a GMP environment – Allen Bradley, Siemens, Beckhoff, Elau, Networking protocols, Wonderware MES and Scada, Fanuc and Staubli Robotics, Vision, Coding and Tracking systems
• 10+ years of MES and IT experience – certified MES solution developer and consultant, experienced in SAP, ERP, OEE and data analysis systems
• Use extensive manufacturing and consulting experience to develop strategies for achieving business goals though the introduction of new processes, equipment, and IT
• Lead and manage high-value capital projects, from business case development, through requirements gathering and vendor selection, to project execution, delivery, integration to site and validation

currentPositions.description: Manage the team responsible for delivering highly complex and time critical systems projects to the business.
currentPositions.title: Operation Systems Engineering Manager

headline: Operation Systems Engineering Manager @ Abbott Diabetes Care

message.text: I’m #hiring. Know anyone who might be interested? #abbottproud

We have an exciting opportunity for a Senior Controls Engineering to join our team at Abbott, Kilkenny. This is a rare opportunity to join a greenfield, large-scale, highly automated manufacturing facility. If you, or someone you know, are interested, please click the link below to learn more.

ingestedContentSummary.description: Apply for Senior Controls Engineer job with Abbott in Ireland - Kilkenny. Operations at Abbott.

U.S. residents only: To request accommodation, please call 224-667-4913 or email corpjat@abbott.com .
ingestedContentSummary.title: Senior Controls Engineer in Ireland - Kilkenny | Operations at Abbott

message.text:
Abbott Kilkenny are searching for an experienced Senior Controls Engineer to join our team. This is an opportunity to be part of the start-up of a fantastic new manufacturing facility which will be making one of the most exciting medical devices in recent years.

Abbott pays a very competitive salary with a comprehensive benefits offering including:
• Family health insurance 
• Excellent pension scheme 
• Life assurance 
• Career Development 
• Growing business plus access to many more benefits

Please click on the link below to learn more about the role and how to apply.

message.text:
I am currently #hiring Manufacturing Systems Engineers to join my growing team at our new Abbott Diabetes Care Kilkenny site. This is a fantastic opportunity to grow with a rapidly expanding global organisation and join an amazing team. 

If you have experience in manufacturing systems, application development, historians, SCADA, MES, DCS, PLCs, HMIs, I want to hear from you. Please click the links below to see our open roles.

https://lnkd.in/etqNTw_m

https://lnkd.in/ez9CcQPp
